Reverts if       - campaign does not exist.       - campaign is inactive.       - claimer has already claimed before.       - campaign is fully claimed.       - `claimFee` is not paid.       - signature verification fails.      Emits `CampaignClaimed`","params":{"_campaignId":"id of the campaign to claim. unique to campaignManager, not global","_campaignManager":"creator of the campaign to claim","_referrer":"referrer for the claim","r":"r component of claim signature from `trustedAddress`","s":"s component of claim signature from `trustedAddress`","v":"v component of claim signature from `trustedAddress`"}},"createCampaign(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Stores a new `Campaign` to `campaigns[campaignManager][campaignId]`.      Transfers the total required tokens from creator to contract.      Reverts if `_tokenAddress` or `_campaignManager` is zero.      Reverts if `_maxClaims` | `_amountPerClaim` is not greater than zero.      Emits `CampaignCreated`","params":{"_amountPerClaim":"amount of tokens received per claim","_campaignManager":"address of the campaign manager","_maxClaims":"max no. of claims possible for the campaign","_maxSponsoredClaims":"no. of sponsored claims","_tokenAddress":"address of token used in campaign"}},"eip712Domain()":{"details":"See {IERC-5267}."},"increaseMaxSponsoredClaims(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Reverts if exceeds max claims","params":{"_additionalSponsoredClaims":"Number to increase current sponsored claims by"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setClaimFee(uint256)":{"details":"Callable only by `owner`.","params":{"_claimFee":"Claim fee"}},"setSponsoredClaimFee(uint256)":{"details":"Callable only by `owner`.","params":{"_sponsoredClaimFee":"Claim fee"}},"setTreasury(address)":{"details":"Callable only by `owner`.      Reverts if `_treasury` is address(0).","params":{"_treasury":"Address to be used for signatures"}},"setTrustedAddress(address)":{"details":"Callable only by `owner`.      Reverts if `_trustedAddress` is address(0).","params":{"_trustedAddress":"Address to be used for signatures"}},"splitAndDepositRewards(uint256,address,address,address)":{"details":"Calls `splitRewards` and `ProtocolRewards#depositRewards`","params":{"_amount":"total amount to split and deposit","_creator":"creator address","_platform":"platform address","_referrer":"referrer address"}},"splitRewards(uint256,address,address,address)":{"details":"Splits `_amount` into platform, creator, and referrer rewards,      based on `PLATFORM_SHARE`, `CREATOR_SHARE`, and `REFERRER_SHARE`","params":{"_amount":"total amount to split","_creator":"creator address","_platform":"platform address","_referrer":"referrer address"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"withdrawCampaign(uint256)":{"details":"Marks campaign as inactive.      Transfers remaining tokens of the campaign to the creator      Reverts if campaign does not exist.      Reverts if campaign is inactive      Emits `CampaignWithdrawn`","params":{"_campaignId":"id of the campaign being withdrawn / cancelled"}},"withdrawTotalClaimFees(address)":{"details":"Transfers `totalClaimFees` to `_treasury` iff it is > 0      Callable only by `owner`.      Emits `Withdrawal`","params":{"_treasury":"treasury address to which funds are withdrawn"}}},"stateVariables":{"ETHAddress":{"details":"ETH pseudo-address used to represent native currency campaigns"},"campaigns":{"details":"Helps avoid writing repeated campaignManager addresses in storage.      campaignId is only unique to each campaignManager, not global"},"hasClaimed":{"details":"Helps avoid multiple hashing & inputs for nested mapping"},"nextCampaignId":{"details":"campaignId is only unique to each campaignManager, not global"},"treasury":{"details":"Receives sponsored claim fees during createCampaign"},"trustedAddress":{"details":"Address used for signatures"}},"title":"Campaigns","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"AlreadyClaimed()":[{"notice":"Emitted when user tries to claim campaign more than once"}],"ExceedsMaxClaims()":[{"notice":"Emitted when incorrect msg.value is passed during purchase or renewal"}],"InvalidAddress()":[{"notice":"Thrown if zero address or creator and referrer are the same"}],"InvalidCount()":[{"notice":"Emitted when trying to claim non existent campaign"}],"TransferFailed()":[{"notice":"Emitted when ether transfer reverted"}]},"events":{"CampaignClaimed(address,uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted claim(address,uint256,bytes32,bytes32,ui.details: Transfers campaign.amountPerClaim tokens to claimer.      Reverts if       - campaign does not exist.       - campaign is inactive.       - claimer has already claimed before.       - campaign is fully claimed.       - `claimFee` is not paid.       - signature verification fails.      Emits `CampaignClaimed`

params._campaignId: id of the campaign to claim. unique to campaignManager, not global
params._campaignManager: creator of the campaign to claim
params.r: r component of claim signature from `trustedAddress`
params.s: s component of claim signature from `trustedAddress`
params.v: v component of claim signature from `trustedAddress`

createCampaign(address,address,uint256,u.details: Stores a new `Campaign` to `campaigns[campaignManager][campaignId]`.      Transfers the total required tokens from creator to contract.      Reverts if `_tokenAddress` or `_campaignManager` is zero.      Reverts if `_maxClaims` | `_amountPerClaim` is not greater than zero.      Emits `CampaignCreated`

params._amountPerClaim: amount of tokens received per claim
params._maxClaims: max no. of claims possible for the campaign
params._tokenAddress: address of token used in campaign

params._additionalSponsoredClaims: Number to increase current sponsored claims by

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setTreasury(address).details: Callable only by `owner`.      Reverts if `_treasury` is address(0).

params._treasury: Address to be used for signatures

setTrustedAddress(address).details: Callable only by `owner`.      Reverts if `_trustedAddress` is address(0).

params._trustedAddress: Address to be used for signatures

params._amount: total amount to split and deposit

splitRewards(uint256,address,address,add.details: Splits `_amount` into platform, creator, and referrer rewards,      based on `PLATFORM_SHARE`, `CREATOR_SHARE`, and `REFERRER_SHARE`

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawCampaign(uint256).details: Marks campaign as inactive.      Transfers remaining tokens of the campaign to the creator      Reverts if campaign does not exist.      Reverts if campaign is inactive      Emits `CampaignWithdrawn`

params._campaignId: id of the campaign being withdrawn / cancelled

withdrawTotalClaimFees(address).details: Transfers `totalClaimFees` to `_treasury` iff it is > 0      Callable only by `owner`.      Emits `Withdrawal`

params._treasury: treasury address to which funds are withdrawn

campaigns(address,uint256).notice: Mapping to store campaigns: campaignManager => campaignId => Campaign

hasClaimed(bytes32).notice: Mapping to store addresses who've claimed a campaign:         keccak256(abi.encode(campaignManager, campaignId, claimer)) => claimed

totalClaimFees().notice: Total claim fees accrued that is withdrawable
